text: The Nasarawa State Executive Council (also known as, the Cabinet of Nasarawa State) is the highest formal governmental body that plays important roles in the Government of Nasarawa State headed by the Governor of Nasarawa State. It consists of the Deputy Governor, Secretary to the State Government, Chief of Staff, Commissioners who preside over ministerial departments, and (with the consent of the legislative arm of the government) the Governor's special aides. ==Functions== The Executive Council exists to advise and direct the Governor.
